title: Enhanced sensitivity in electrochemical detection of ochratoxin A within food samples using ferrocene- and aptamer-tethered gold nanoparticles on disposable electrodes
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,8007-8015
DOI: 10.1039/D3RA08567H, Paper

Wicem Argoubi, Faisal K. Algethami, Noureddine Raouafi
A highly sensitive yet simple-to-preare electrochemical aptasensor was designed for OTA biosensing in real samples. Ferrocene was introduced as a transducing agent, eliminating the need for a solution-based approach.
